intro.description: Three different types of ACT-R projects can be imported into the workbench.

item.title: Zip Archives
item.description: If you receive an archived project from somone else, it is easily imported using the import command and selecting Existing Projects into Workspace. From there you can specify the zip file to use.

item.title: Local File System
item.description: If the project already exists on your harddrive, you can once again use Import, Existing Projects into Workspace, but this time select the root folder of the project.

item.title: Binary Plugins
item.description: Some projects are distributed as binaries that are installed into the workbench. These can be imported by using Import, Plugins and Fragments, and selecting Projects with source folders. You will then be presented a list of all available plugins to select from.
